answers.answer: Some icecream preferably a banana split I saw a pic on fb lol
Sushi...but can't have the ones I really want. :( maybe I'll have to settle for some teriaki chicken and a California roll.....
Craving sushi every day but craving what i can actually eat. Poutine. And juicy burger with lots of cheese. Donuts with filling cinnabun.
Steak sauce! Without the steak lmao
Today, a big ole juicy steak with salad and baked potato! Luckily I get to indulge later :)
Canes chicken fingers and oiled crawfish, ate canes for lunch and getting crawfish for dinner :)
Chiinkz! Thats what i love but due to my asthma i can only have it once a week and ive already ate a a whole half by my self
chili dogs. Its all I wanted all day. preferably from James Coney island.
Sausage link Kolaches and creme cheese kolaches from my towns Czech bakery. Thankfully it's right up the road :)
I've been craving children's bubblegum toothpaste today. Very odd lol I think I just want to lick it, not eat it.
At the moment i'd be happy to eat anything sugary! Having gestational diabetes is the pits....diet yogurts, fruit, and wholemeal salad sandwiches just don't cut it sometimes :(
Jelly i wanted orange flavour yesterday. Todays is port wine .. Jello for americans lol.Om nom nomAnd maybe a good steak with mac nd cheese
